parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the E-HPC cluster.

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description:
The duration of the profiling process. Unit: seconds.

Value values: 10 to 300.

Default value: 30.

parameters.name: Freq
parameters.description:
The sampling frequency. Unit: Hz. Valid values: 1 to 2000.

Default value: 2000.

parameters.name: ProcessId
parameters.description: The ID of the profiling process.
